function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 in buildings due to poor ventilation and crowded spaces","Impact":"Increased spread of the COVID-19 virus, higher risk of infection","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, reducing crowding, and implementing infection control measures","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, antimicrobial paint, bipolar ionization, ultraviolet radiation, plasma technology","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially in crowded areas","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Limited focus on other research topics in healthy building technologies, with emphasis mainly on COVID-19 and ventilation","Impact":"Lack of comprehensive understanding and development in other areas of healthy building technologies","Mitigation":"Encouraging research and development in diverse areas of healthy building technologies","Technologies":"Research and development in areas such as indoor air quality, immunity level, indoor plant, green construction, adaptive reuse","People":"Researchers, technology developers, building industry professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Heavy reliance on buildings for livelihood activities during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Higher exposure to COVID-19 virus in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures, promoting outdoor activities, improving indoor air quality","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, ultraviolet radiation, adaptive reuse for outdoor spaces","People":"General population, building occupants","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners"}]}
